Text: Aaaagghh!

...H-How could we be defeated...so easily
...and one-sidedly?!
We...never once let our guard down!

We were even fully aware that this bottleneck was
the most precarious point on the transport route!

...But you panicked when we cut off your path and
failed to anticipate we were rushing you along the
road.

It's easy work dividing a unit that's already moving in
a hurry and has spread itself thin!

The more cautious your opponent is, the easier it is
to take advantage of that.

After all, caution is nothing more than a passive
stance that reacts to circumstances.

What the hell are you people playing at?! Hold on,
are you after the possessed human?!

That's part of why we're here. But there's another
equally important reason.
Eradicating you...the Cult of Diablos.
*gasp* Wait...you're not...you can't be!

The Shadow Garden that Lord Fenrir spoke of...
You mean to say you actually exist?!
Aaaghhh?!

Looks like I can land more than three targets...
I'll need to train harder!
Th-That's...impossible! A magic slash?!
...It's the reality of this world.
There exists those who can control magic to attack...

...and those of us known as the Shadow Garden,
who lurk in the darkness and hunt down shadows
such as you!
Agh...aah!

...Heh...heh... You may think you've succeeded
in using the falling rocks to divide us from the
possessed!
But you're not the only ones who're after herâ€”

We've already taken the appropriate measures to
handle the Templars.
Wh-What?! How much do you people...know?!

...Looks like the Cult anticipated the attack from
the Templars.

And Gamma perfectly predicted the Cult's anticipation
along with their other movements.

Beyond her management skills, she also has
a knack for military strategy.
The best brains in the Shadow Garden... I'm jealous.
Heheh... I appreciate your honesty, Epsilon.

That said, we'll need the unique strengths you have
honed for the difficulties that await us after this
battle.

We'll rescue the possessed while Zeta distracts
the Templars.

And your precision in controlling magic will be
essential for curing the possessed human.
Lady Alpha... Understood!
...Amateurs.
Zeta!!!

I know why you and your Templars made your way out
here. You want to finish off the possessed.

Not to mention, a human possessed this time. I guess
killing her holds significant meaning to the lot of you.

But after fighting your Templars again, there's
something that puzzles me, Prophetess.

Why go out of your way to pay such a high price?
And why pay with the lives of others rather than
your own?

Not that I care how many Templar bastards
die for you...

But you're making your own soldiers who revere you
throw away their lives. That's hardly the saintly act
of a holy woman.

(Now then, let's see how she responds to my
provocations.)

(That said, just as Gamma anticipated, their movements
and maneuvers are oddly sluggish compared to the
battle at the abandoned villageâ€”)
Zeta...there is something I would like to ask you.

I might be able to answer so long as it's nothing
related to this Goddess Beatrixâ€”

...Is it true that you were cured of your possessionâ€”
that the possessed are really curable?
It is.
What proof do youâ€”
None.

Even if there were any, it wouldn't matter. After all,
the possessed have been eradicated from this world as
if they never existed.

What need would such an entity have to prove
anything to anyone?

We will never need such proof so long as we exist
within this world.
But!
As your "friend," Prophetess, allow me to warn you.

Don't act like you suddenly wish to understand the
suffering of those you've wronged and abused.

Not unless you're prepared...to discard everything
you believe in and stand for...and to question the
world as you see it now.

And regardless of what you may think, you are the
oppressors...

...and only the blood of the Cult of Diablos and you
Templars can atone for your sins.
Zeta!

As for us...we are the ones who lurk in the darkness
to resist your tyranny and hunt down shadows like
you.
Now die with your false faith, Prophetess!
